channel.title: Machine Learning on Jimmie Butler
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Jimmie Butler

item.title: 30ml - Colaboratory + Dog Breeds
item.description: I’m starting a 30 days of machine learning challenge for myself. I’m going to target posting at least one thing a day around machine learning and my own exploration each day. Today I went followed an article on getting running with a kaggle dataset on google co-laboratory. https://medium.com/@vivekpothina/working-with-kaggle-dataset-on-google-colab-d3d4a77ead62 Short of needing long running gpu instances, I’ll likely be using co-laboratory for much of my exploration in the future. It really is nearly exact copy paste with some notes, but my version of the article code can be found here.
